duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure store sales goals are met and achieve individual sales goals.
Assist with day-to-day management of the store, in the absence of the Store Manager.
Deliver exceptional customer experiences and drive sales by styling and wardrobing each customer.
Represent the brand and ensure team members embody the brand in all interactions with customers and peers.
Build client relationships and drive store sales through client outreach.
Communicate effectively with Store Manager regarding individual goals, skill development updates, employee relations, and day-to-day operations.
Assist with recruiting top talent and retain talent that will contribute to sales growth.
Assist with managing payroll and store scheduling within established guidelines to ensure proper coverage based on business needs.
Support and execute directives from Visual Merchandising, Operations, and Marketing.
Ensure Loss Prevention policies and procedures are followed. Assist with financial/sales audits and inventories to protect the store from internal and external shortage.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
